about_the_game:
It's a Gluttonous Life is a life simulator set in an alternate 2000s in a city inhabited by voracious anthropomorphic animal women. After waking up from a coma and suffering from amnesia, you find yourself as prey in a world where vore is legal, albeit with some limitations. Thankfully, a nurse takes pity on you and lets you stay at her place until you can get back on your feet. Now you have to find a way to make a living while also avoiding being turned into padding on a woman's hips.

Features
  • 6 Predators. Three of which you can live with.
  • Character customization. You can even add custom pronouns to yourself if you wish.
  • Customize gameplay elements to your liking at the start of the game.
  • Numerous vore and sex scenes.
  • Interactive vore with multiple different options and ways to escape. Predators have different stomachs and intestines depending on their size, shape, and diet.
  • Build relationships with the various predators to unlock new interactions.
  • Pick one of several different jobs, or live off of your own luck.
  • Explore multiple areas.
  • Level up skills.
  • Minigames such as Texas Hold 'em and the stock market.
  • Day-Night cycle, weather, and seasons, as well as dynamic character schedules that are influenced by them.
  • The game is moddable and has its own little modding community.
  • The game is actively being developed, with an update every month. Old saves are fully compatible with any new version.

Contains F/?, oral vore, and digestion. Unbirth, anal vore, and absorption can be toggled on or off at game start. More types of vore might also be available via mods.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. The characters depicted in the game are 18 years old of age or older.

Includes explicit sexual content and behavior some viewers may find offensive or disturbing. Characters engage in vorarephilia (the erotic desire to be consumed by, or sometimes to personally consume, another person or creature), as well as oral, vaginal, anal, and non-penetrative sexual acts. Anthropomorphic animal characters (furries), sexual domination and submission, size difference, sadism, sexual assault, bodily fluids, and alternative sexual lifestyles are portrayed.

Strong language is sometimes used. The game contains use of alcohol and tobacco.

The story, characters, names, and actions are fictitious, and any similarity to real life is coincidental and unintended.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: A lewd life simulator game set in an alternate early 2000s where you have to juggle mundane responsibilities such as going to work and paying rent, while also avoiding getting eaten and digested by beautiful anthro girls.
